entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [JIT] X64 - Recognize patterns to emit `bts`, `btc`, `btr` instructions #81512
  • Unexpected breaking change in .NET 7 #81506
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10042) - SetMulticastOption #81507
  • Assertion failed '(emitCurIGfreeBase <= lastInsActualStartAddr) && (lastInsActualStartAddr < emitCurIGfreeEndp)' #81505
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: obj->GetGCSafeMethodTable ()->HasFinalizer () #81504
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a "CustomData" property to JsonPropertyInfo. #81502
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector2/3 #81501
    Future
  • IUtf8SpanFormattable and IUtf8SpanParsable #81500
  • Add [Obsolete] attribute for System.Data.SqlClient in .NET Core and above #81495
  • Zero-lifetime HTTP pool can sometimes reuse connections #81494
  • Can't build for arm on an arm64 windows box #81493
  • ConfigurationSection not loading under latest assembly package #81488
  • coreclr-tools (ILAsm/ILDasm) should be released every version similar to targeting packs #81487
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Quaternion and Plane #81483
    Future
  • Add handling for SIMD constants in Mono #81482
    Future
  • Difference of Codegen in JIT ASM when using Negation / `if`-`else` block code #81479
  • JIT: If conversion does not check BasicBlock::isRunRarely() #81478
    8.0.0
  • NotSupportedException when deserializing DBNull from RESX #81471
  • .Net 7 Distributed Transaction - scope.Dispose() block process #81469
  • Enable source-build pre-built detection #81468
  • Assertion failed 'value != 0' in 'System.Tests.DoubleTests_GenericMath:GetExponentShortestBitLengthTest()' during 'Do value numbering' #81460
  • Resource message stripping not compatible with our event sources #81459
  • How to return empty list instance of list of null by system.text.json in net 7.0 #81458
  • Incomplete chain of mutual TLS client cert downloaded twice per http call when run as non-root linux user #81456

Closed

  • WriteEntry_LongFileSize tests failing in CI #79773
  • Random jit stress failures in JIT\Directed\arglist\vararg #81049
    8.0.0
  • msquic.dll is no longer included in the Windows shared runtime #81447
    8.0.0
  • LINQ Select swallowing exceptions #81499
  • [wasm] `dotnet-runtime-perf` - OOM on `Perf_File.ReadAllBytes` with `size=100M` #79047
    8.0.0
  • System.ExecutionEngineException: Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #79969
  • Test failure GC/Regressions/Github/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219.sh #77466
  • Assert failure: (size (xl) > 0) #76857
    8.0.0
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) or unexpected NullReferenceException in XElement.Attribute(XName) #78759
    8.0.0
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) in .Net 7 #78206
    7.0.2
  • Defect in ReaderWriterLock when using it in recursive scenarios and multiple instances on the same thread #38638
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ECDsa.Create() should be marked as obsoleted #81410
  • Mono llvmaot failing for some HardwareIntrinsics tests #75566
    8.0.0
  • Memory leak in JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable when constructors are used #80933
    8.0.0
  • `AssemblyVersion` and `FileVersion` doesn't seem correct when accessed programmatically #81435
  • OCSP revocation check does not work on Linux container #81392
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: Regressions in IfStatements #77984
    8.0.0
  • Test timeout: Receive*FromAsyncV*BoundToSpecificV*_Success #57937
    Future
  • SendPacketsElement_FileStreamMultiPartMixed_MultipleFileStreams_Success failing on win-arm64 #51651
    Future
  • Failing SendReceive_MemoryArrayTask.SendAsync_ConcurrentDispose_SucceedsOrThrowsAppropriateException test #55085
    Future
  • Test timeout: BeginReceiveFromV6BoundToSpecificV6_Success #58452
    Future
  • Test fails: ConnectV4IPAddressToV6Host_Fails #57132
    Future
  • Test timeout: BeginSendToV6IPEndPointToV6Host_Success #58453
    Future
  • HttpConnection leaks UnobservedTaskExceptions #61256
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: Send_0ByteSend_Success #58356
    Future
  • Test failure: SendRecv_0ByteReceive_Success #58631
    Future
  • [bug] .net 6 & .net 7 cant deserialize dictionary & keyvaluepair #81449
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 12/5/2022 7:07:15 PM #79604
    8.0.0
  • X86Base.CpuId is not user-friendly API #62466
    Future
  • A module initializer will not be triggered when accessing a forwarded type #77632

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix build for FreeBSD arm64 w/NativeAOT #81510
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use MiniDumpWriteDump to create dumps on Windows #81509
    area-Infrastructure
  • diagnostic to detect malformed format strings in lsg template message #81503
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Append version to RID only with valid characters #81497
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT instruction for NixOS #81485
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Added tests to check IsSupported. #81481
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • WIP: Support targeting iOS platforms with ILCompiler #81476
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete `!CODEGEN_CPP` ifdefs from NAOT smoke tests #81474
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Do not print stack trace if error reading crashReportJsonFile #81467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests: skip some tests on systems that don't support SHA1 signatures, like RHEL9. #81465
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Install workload manifests in sdk band version derived from the #81461
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Revert "Inline resource strings in the compiler (#80896)" #81455
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] EXPERIMENT - Folding GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR) => GT_LCL_VAR #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][WIP] wasi testing #81452
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: build pred lists first #81448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabling firefox debugger tests on CI rolling builds #81511
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • WarningsAsErrors -> TreatWarningsAsErrors #81508
    area-Meta
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in MailBnfHelper #81486
    area-System.Net
  • Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add note on WarningsAsErrors #81451
    area-Meta
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Install workload manifests in sdk band version derived from the #81457
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Update GTF_GLOB_REF after last-use copy omission #81430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not strip resource messages if EventSource would use it #81466
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not remove resource messages in Xml tests #81463
    area-System.Xml
  • Make newly introduced Immutable tests work with AOT. #81464
    area-System.Collections
  • [release/8.0-preview1] [QUIC] Fix conditions to bin place msquic.dll for Windows builds #81492
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Change Source link version number refs to new properties #81190
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [QUIC] Fix conditions to bin place msquic.dll for Windows builds #81490
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Enable in-build signing based on branch #81498
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Enable in-build signing based on branch #81496
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Sync ILLink #81450
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Enable packaging of Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks from runtime #81446
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix ReaderWriterLock when using it in recursive scenarios and multiple instances on the same thread #81257
    area-System.Threading
  • [PERF] Remove Android Maui Scenarios from Runtime Repo #81453
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] benchmark - generated JSON serializer #81475
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove ArgumentState "caching" that leaked memory deserialization. #81473
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Avoid unobserved ReadAheadTask exceptions in HttpConnection #80214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid xchg for resolution #81216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Drop `_SampleProject` and `_SampleAssembly` properties #81421
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable jiterpreter traces; fix floating point compares #81417
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Branding of .NET 8.0 Preview1 #81398
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Address ConfigurationBinder feedback #81384
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Bump main branding to .NET 8.0 Preview2 #81399
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve the codegen of the vector accelerated `System.Numerics.*` types #81335
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger]Adding stack info to the exception details when evaluating expressions #81440
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] wasi: Enable library tests on CI #81052
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch (i.e. start emitting cmov instructions) #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • NativeAOT Fully implements warning suppressions logic #81266
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add star into link attributes #81407
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Allow users to control behavior of undefined symbols #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Allow inlining for ldsfld + value-type #78736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: change profile slop assert to a jitdump note #81377
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2102376 #81359
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Consider method accessibility in interface resolution #81409
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve CI path-changes-based-triggers to work better #79127
    area-Infrastructure
  • Run nativeaot tests in helix #81439
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] correctly initalize CONTEXT before failing fast #81010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Enable same set of analyzers for C# tools as for the rest of repo #81073
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [browser] javascript build cleanup #81212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup in HelloiOS app #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [browser] PGO AOT samples #81221
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Disable hill climbing by default #81406
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Introduce symbol stripping build task for HelloiOS sample app #81361
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] no posix socks emulation #81182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    area-System.Net, 7.0.x
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 6.0.15
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • Update the assert to correctly check if a tree with value has non-zero destination registers #81412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] VSD support #2147

PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAot-LLVM: Merge before putarg type removal PR 68748 #2187
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement more opcodes #2188
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement cached interface dispatch for WASM #2184

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The Web SDK should default the Program class in top-level statements programs to public so that it's easy to reference from test projects #30274
    8.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Watch.BrowserRefresh causes Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref 6.0 prebuilts #30272
  • Concurrency problem creating dotnet tool manifests #30254
  • NETSDK1129 incorrectly thrown during publish when TargetFrameworks is used but only a single framework is present #30251
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure that parameter default value don't change #30249
  • dotnet tool install hangs, then fails #30248
  • [NETSDKE2E]With .NET 8 SDK installed, the default publish path is "/bin/Release/..." not "/bin/Debug/..." when running "dotnet publish" in CLI #30245

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET 7.0.101 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: (Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.android-arm, 6.0.12) displayed when installing andriod workload in CLI. #29212
    7.0.2xx
  • Package 'dotnet-sdk-7.0' has no installation candidate on Xubuntu / Ubuntu 22.04 #30184

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30273
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor allowEmptyTelemetry to use Items and support hashing #30269
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP] Workload Clean #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix bug with `dotnet publish -p:Foo` #30265
    Area-NetSDK
  • Generate a call of a base class constructor if the default constructor does not exist. #30264
    Area-GenAPI
  • READ.ME Includes PR Timeline Guide + Explain Nightly Builds in Documentation #30263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Warn if the publish profile provided is not present in the project #30239
    Area-WebSDK

Merged

  • Update the target framework for the non-restored test projects #30190
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Wcwidth.Sources from 0.6.0 to 1.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #30247
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Fix SupportsTargetFramework for tests - 7.0.3xx #30235
  • Upgrade to latest `CodeAnalysis.Workspaces`. Get rid of workarounds and cover latest supported features with Tests. #30250
    Area-GenAPI
  • Introduce Dependabot for updating the same dependencies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Preview branding #30203
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix up 'CurrentTargetFramework' usage error #30212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update README.md #30085
    Area-WebSDK
  • Fix SupportsTargetFramework for tests - 7.0.2xx #30234
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Type Classes (aka Concepts, Structural Generic Constraints)" #110
    Working Set
  • Champion: using aliases for any types #4284
    Working Set
  • Primary Constructors #2691

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • solutioncrawler.workcoordinatortests.additionaldocumentopenedclosedevents is flaky #66658
  • False-positive for IDE0059 when using a variable in an async local function #66657
  • Visual Studio 17.4 Incorrect Enforcing of New Breaking Change in Earlier C# Versions #66646
  • CSharpSyntaxRewriter recursive evaluation does not support lengthy chained binary expressions #66640
  • C# refactoring "Move type to new file" generates file violating stylecop rule SA1505 #66639
  • Suboptimal codegen for local async method #66638
  • EnumUnderlyingType is NULL when calling Complation.GetTypeByMetadataName() on any Enum defined in a MetadataReference. #66631

Closed

  • IDE0019 "use pattern matching" introduces nullable warnings #37875
    Backlog
  • Generic extension does not have lambda intellisense. #33469
    Backlog
  • VS 16.2.3 - IDE0044 CodeFix Removes Whitespace #38468
    Backlog
  • Create and assign field/property should recognize tuple initializer pattern #49107
    Backlog
  • Converting from if to switch removes comments #41131
    Backlog
  • ITypeSymbolExtensions.FindImplementationsForInterfaceMemberAsync uses CPU inefficiently #36538
    Backlog
  • System.ArgumentException: Not a C# symbol. #37333
    Backlog
  • IDE0016 loses comments #38102
    Backlog
  • TypeInferrer should look at future occurrences of variables to determine what type to infer: #44861
    Backlog
  • IDE0032 is incorrectly suggested for pointer fields used with address-of operator #38286
    Backlog
  • Use Implicit Type does not work for 'ref' locals #41780
    Backlog
  • ExtractMethodCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error #55411
    17.6 P2
  • Go to definition (F12) doesn't work when a local variable is selected in the editor (C#) #43183
    Backlog
  • Task List (C#), find "TODO" etc even when in para's #39360
    Backlog
  • VB.NET: Wrong return type when automatically creating a method for an if-statement #47153
    Backlog
  • Codelens doesnt count event handlers as references in VB #46214
    Backlog
  • Nullable value type receiver of a constrained call is unexpectedly copied #66162
    17.5
  • Warning CS4014 not triggered on async methods behind an interface within an Action or Func<> #64964
    C# 12.0
  • IDE0064: False positive when all readonly fields of a struct are static #57920
    Backlog
  • Refactor "Remove parameter" mistakenly removes arguments with '@' #66547
    17.6
  • INvalidOperationException from VisualBasicMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider #66489
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce copies in shadow load #66662
    Area-Compilers
  • Preserve refkind when converting local function to method #66661
    Area-IDE
  • Preserve spacing on trivia for invert if #66660
    Area-IDE
  • Support goto def to a Dispose method when on a 'using' statement #66659
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid directory enumerations in DeleteLeftoverDirectories #66656
    Area-Analyzers
  • Targeting IDE projects to .NET 6 #66655
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid compacting TransformNode's state table #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle all placeholders in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #66641
    Area-Compilers
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
  • [17.5] Add `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler` #66636
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert language-specific option types to records #66633
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Do not offer to use pattern matching when it would break in a nullable context #66652
    Area-IDE, Next
  • 17.4 Servicing: Fix null ref in change signature #66606
    Area-IDE
  • 17.4 servicing: Fix issue where Solution-Explorer symbol nodes collapse after a… #66605
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66634
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Preserve comments better when converting an if to a switch #66648
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Preserve leading trivia when making a field readonly #66649
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Preserve trivia when converting throw-statement to throw-expr #66651
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support adding to a tuple-assignment if that's the form the user currently has. #66630
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add test showing issue doesn't repro #66647
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not offer 'use auto prop' on pointers we take the address of #66650
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve type-inferrer results by looking at future usages of a variable. #66644
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix reading default values in IVisualStudioStorageReadFallback implementations #66599
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support inference in a single-line vb if-statement #66642
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix goto-def when the user has a selection in the code. #66645
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Inline Diagnostics - fix multiple empty line bug #66548
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ignore Razor design time documents for CompileTimeSolution #66632
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Warn for calls in top-level statements that could be awaited #66571
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Snap 17.6 Preview 1 #66613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix issue where we were errantly offering to make static fields writable #66623
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement LSP codelens for reference counts #66537
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change Signature - Fix 'remove parameter' removing arguments with '@' #66628
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix "MoveStaticMembers" for VB with invalid member #66629
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66664
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers, DemoContent
  • Add VerifyMethodBody helper as a replacement of VerifyIL #66536
    Area-Compilers
  • Test/implement more aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66583
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix extraction inside anonymous function #66158
    Area-IDE
  • Process host outputs by `GeneratorDriver` #66570
    Area-Compilers
  • Continued analyzer assembly loading work #66612
    Area-Compilers
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.6
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Counters & Logs for 404s and MapFallback #46404
  • Implement a mechanism for delivering updates from within the MVC view engine #46403
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Identify the code the compiler needs to generate when rendering a component from within a Razor Page/View #46402
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Bring back stateful prerendering #46401
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Data loading without needing a server API endpoint #46400
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Progressive enhancement of form submission & navigation #46399
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Unified project system #46398
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Auto switching for interactive components #46397
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Security Review for Blazor United #46396
    .NET 8 Planning
  • We have a project template where we can add support for Server and Webassembly #46395
    .NET 8 Planning
  • We can interleave Static/Server/WebAssembly components within an app #46394
    .NET 8 Planning
  • We can perform basic CRUD operations on a completely SSR Razor Components app #46393
    .NET 8 Planning
  • allow stripping the icu data for blazor apps #46392
  • name claim does not seem to be full qualified #46388

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navigation json column IReadOnlyCollection #30195
  • Value comparer out of memory #30194
  • Performance of `GetMigrations()` extension method over `DatabaseFacade` #30192
  • Is `ManyServiceProvidersCreatedWarning` expected when adding services in OnConfiguring and "externally" #30191
  • MySQL EnityFramework Errors in MAUI #30189
  • ExecuteSqlRaw(string) fails with FormatException 'Input string was not in a correct format.' #30188
  • RelationalConnectionDependencies depending on IRelationalCommandBuilderFactory #30187

Closed

  • Add warning/code analyzer that mapping via function call produces different SQL (selects all columns) than inline mapping #30162
  • SQL Server: use EnableOptimizedParameterBinding in SaveChanges #30190
  • SQL Server Graph support #30180
  • ExecuteUpdate does not work with owned Entities #30176
  • Eager loading two objects with reference to same related object (N:1) with same context #30165
  • ExecuteUpdate: Add SetProperty overload that accepts a property name or property info directly (no lambda) #30149
  • Provide a simpler mechanism for requesting alternative DbContext configurations when using DI #30114
  • Dynamic tables in entity framework #30092
  • Using EF Core 7 in net6 project #30085
  • ExecuteUpdate is not working with Sqlite #30155
